serviceList.title: Software solutions
serviceList.description: Offering both project-based work and long-term collaborations to build your custom software.

serviceList.title: Web development
serviceList.description: Frontend and backend development, creating modern and responsive web applications.

serviceList.title: Consultation & chat
serviceList.description: Available for consultation or just a chat to discuss your ideas and goals.

about.paragraph1: Hi, my name is Marcel Horváth. I am from the Czech Republic.
about.paragraph2: My journey in programming began in high school, where I developed an interest in programming and creating websites. Now, I am studying at the Technical University of Liberec, where I am fully dedicated to this field.
about.paragraph3: Programming is not only a job for me but also a hobby. I love creating websites and applications the most, but I can do much more and I am able to learn new things quickly.

items.details: Developing and maintaining websites. Migrating from Vue 2 to Vue 3.
Contributed to the development of autonomous vehicles. Worked with internal programs, data analysis, and teamwork.
High School with focus on programming and mathematics

siprec.name: Siprec
siprec.description: Complex internal web application for recording, playback and analysis of calls, including data export and other advanced features.
siprec.work: Migration from Vue2 to Vue3, new design, bug fixing, implementation of new features, development of a player along with call transcription.
siprec.technologies: Vue.js, Javascript, Vuetify, Vuex, Webpack, Vue-compat, openpgp

neznamy-vlastnik.name: Neznamy-vlastnik
neznamy-vlastnik.description: Interactive web application designed to search for property owners on a map.
neznamy-vlastnik.work: Developed the application from scratch, integrated various map layers, dynamic display of parcels and their information, search and filtering.

tritio-telekonference.name: Tritio Telekonference
tritio-telekonference.description: A platform for video calls, video conferences and webinars, including user management, recordings and other features.
tritio-telekonference.work: Development of a new version of the application with improved user experience and advanced features. Not publicly published.

mapa-kriminality-liberec.name: Mapa kriminality Liberec
mapa-kriminality-liberec.description: Bachelor's project showing crime on a map of Liberec for the city police, enabling better planning and prevention.
mapa-kriminality-liberec.work: Development of the application, integration of map layers and crime data, filtering, and searching.
mapa-kriminality-liberec.technologies: React.js, Typescript, Leaflet, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL

inteligentni-system-sledovani-rostlin.name: Inteligentní systém sledování rostlin
inteligentni-system-sledovani-rostlin.description: Bachelor thesis using a Raspberry Pi equipped with a number of sensors, a pump for irrigation and a camera for monitoring the plant. The web application allows visualization of the data, creation of timelapse videos and evaluation of plant health using AI.
inteligentni-system-sledovani-rostlin.work: Development of a complete system, integration of hardware and software, creation of AI models for plant health analysis.
inteligentni-system-sledovani-rostlin.technologies: React.js, Typescript, Node.js, Express.js, FFmpeg, Python, TensorFlow

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: I'm here to help! If you have any questions, comments, or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
